content:
The Security Service's cyberfactors have exposed new attempts by the aggressor to inflict firing strategic infrastructure of Ukraine.

About thisinformsSecurity Service of Ukraine.

It is noted that as a result of special operation in Kiev and Odessa, two FSB agents were detained. They were preparing rocket strokes on the military units of the Defense Forces and Energy and Telecommunications in three regions.

"In the area of special attention of agents there were army units that provide protection of the General Staff of the Armed Forces, data on the forces of defense in Poltava region, as well as the Kiev TV tower and the Capital TPP," - said in the department.

In addition, the attackers at first tried to identify the places of base of Ukrainian troops, and then send the occupants the corresponding coordinates to adjust air attacks.

"For the hidden collection of intelligence, one of the Russian agents set up a freight forwarder to the Odessa company that supplies food to the units of defense forces," the SBU said.

The investigation found that the other person involved - collecting information about the technical condition of the Kiev TV tower after its shelling in March 2022.

He also photographed the appearance of one of the thermal power plants, which provides electricity and heat to a large part of the capital region.

According to the available data, this information needed an aggressor to make a decision to adjust repeated or new strikes on a local TPP and a TV tower.

“The SBU staff exposed the reconnaissance activity of Russian agents in a timely manner and gradually documented it. Measures have also been taken to protect the defense forces and the protection of critical infrastructure, ”the SBU stressed.

At the final stage of the special operation of both malefactors, it was arrested on hot when they were spying for potential purposes for the occupiers.

According to the investigation, one of the hostile associates was the engineer-technologist of the food industry of Odessa. Another is a 24-year-old Kiev resident.

At the end of January this year, they were remotely recruited by the FSB personnel employee in Moscow and the Moscow region. His identity has already been established by the Security Service.

Both agents acted separately from each other and received cash from Russia for cooperation in favor of the aggressor country.

During the searches, mobile phones were removed in the premises of the detainees with evidence of correspondence with the FSB and bank cards that were received by Russian funds.

Currently, investigators of the Security Services have informed both the persons who were suspected under Part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (State betrayal committed in the conditions of martial law).

The attackers are in custody. They are threatened with life imprisonment. The special operation was carried out under the procedural guidance of the Attorney General's office.

As reported by the Armyinform, up to 12 years in prison was convicted of military Russiankept in a cellar family with two young children.
title: The FSB agent group was detained, which was preparing rocket strikes on the Kiev TV tower and units of the Armed Forces General Staff
description: The Security Service of Ukraine informs about it. It is noted that as a result of special operation in ...
author: Army Inform
